code: @Test public void testInterceptSendToEndpoint() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").loadBalance().failover().to("seda:end1", "seda:end2").         }     }).     RouteDefinition route = context.getRouteDefinitions().get(0).     RouteReifier.adviceWith(route, context, new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             interceptSendToEndpoint("seda:end1").skipSendToOriginalEndpoint().to("mock:end").         }     }).     context.start().     getMockEndpoint("mock:end").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
